Package camzup.core

Class Color.MixHsva

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Color.AbstrEasing
camzup.core.Color.MixHsva
All Implemented Interfaces:
Utils.EasingFuncObj<Color>, Utils.QuadFunction<Color,​Color,​java.lang.Float,​Color,​Color>
Enclosing class:
Color
public static class Color.MixHsva
extends Color.AbstrEasing
Eases between colors by hue, saturation and value.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MixHsva()
    The default constructor.
    MixHsva​(Color.HueEasing hueFunc)
    Creates a color HSVA mixing function with the given easing functions for hue.

  • Constructor Details

    • MixHsva

      public MixHsva()
      The default constructor. Creates a mixer with nearest hue interpolation and linear interpolation for saturation and value.

    • MixHsva

      public MixHsva​(Color.HueEasing hueFunc)
      Creates a color HSVA mixing function with the given easing functions for hue.
      Parameters:
      hueFunc - the hue easing function

      Applies the function.
      Specified by:
      applyUnclamped in class Color.AbstrEasing
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin color
      dest - the destination color
      step - the step in a range 0 to 1
      target - the output color
      Returns:
      the eased color
      See Also:
